trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGROC2FALCONSNEST_00281_FALCONSNESTGUIDE_000_000<tab>Everything looks to be in order... Hm? Is aught amiss?
TEXT_REGROC2FALCONSNEST_00281_FALCONSNESTGUIDE_000_001<tab>...If this is about that damned protest, I don't want to hear it.
TEXT_REGROC2FALCONSNEST_00281_FALCONSNESTGUIDE_000_002<tab>Fury take me, so many guests with so many questions! Oh! Um...you don't happen to have any questions, do you?
TEXT_REGROC2FALCONSNEST_00281_FALCONSNESTGUIDE_000_003<tab>Everything looks to be in order...I think. <sigh> Is aught amiss?
TEXT_REGROC2FALCONSNEST_00281_FALCONSNESTGUIDE_000_010<tab>Keep watch for dragons and heretics, what else? You never know when the enemy might strike.

TEXT_REGROC2FALCONSNEST_00281_FALCONSNESTGUIDE_000_011<tab>It is my duty to ensure that the reconstruction of Falcon's Nest proceeds apace. To that end, our craftsmen must be able to work without fear for their safety.

TEXT_REGROC2FALCONSNEST_00281_FALCONSNESTGUIDE_000_012<tab>House Durendaire shares this responsibility with House Dzemael. Should our efforts come to naught, both houses will have to answer to the Holy See.
TEXT_REGROC2FALCONSNEST_00281_FALCONSNESTGUIDE_000_100<tab>Keep watch for dragons and heretics, what else? You never know when the enemy might strike.
TEXT_REGROC2FALCONSNEST_00281_FALCONSNESTGUIDE_000_101<tab>Of course, when they <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> strike, there's no guarantee we'll be able to do a damn thing about it...
TEXT_REGROC2FALCONSNEST_00281_FALCONSNESTGUIDE_000_102<tab>Just thinking back to that ceremony makes me shudder. It's a bloody miracle that wyrm didn't slaughter us all then and there.
TEXT_REGROC2FALCONSNEST_00281_FALCONSNESTGUIDE_000_020<tab>Falcon's Nest was once a hamlet with a small garrison of knights. Many were skilled falconers who trained their birds to track the Horde.
TEXT_REGROC2FALCONSNEST_00281_FALCONSNESTGUIDE_000_021<tab>When the snows came, the garrison was forced to withdraw, along with most everyone else in the western highlands.

TEXT_REGROC2FALCONSNEST_00281_FALCONSNESTGUIDE_000_022<tab>But times have changed. The Holy See would have us reclaim what was lost, starting with Falcon's Nest. It won't be easy, but anything worth doing rarely is, eh?
